94th Aero Squadron Restaurant - San Diego - About Skip to Main Content Toggle navigation Menus Daily Specials Upcoming Events Club 94th Banquets Gift Cards Reservations Careers Facebook page Instagram page Yelp page About us Located inside a replica of a World War I French farmhouse, the restaurant sits overlooking Montgomery Field Airport and is packed full of military memorabilia, antique farm implements, and aviation relics. The interior is cozy and romantic, with huge stone fireplaces, masses of hanging green plants, dark wood paneling, beamed ceilings, and old airplane wings hanging over the dining area. On warm evenings and at lunchtime, you can sit outdoors on a grassy embankment at umbrella topped tables and be surrounded by old model airplanes and an army jeep. Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 Dot slide navigation number 4 Dot slide navigation number 5 Dot slide navigation number 6 Dot slide navigation number 7 Dot slide navigation number 8 Dot slide navigation number 9 slideshow start stop playing About us Located inside a replica of a World War I French farmhouse, the restaurant sits overlooking Montgomery Field Airport and is packed full of military memorabilia, antique farm implements, and aviation relics. The interior is cozy and romantic, with huge stone fireplaces, masses of hanging green plants, dark wood paneling, beamed ceilings, and old airplane wings hanging over the dining area. On warm evenings and at lunchtime, you can sit outdoors on a grassy embankment at umbrella topped tables and be surrounded by old model airplanes and an army jeep. About 94th Aero Squadron The 94th Aero Squadron was one of the first American fighter squadrons to see combat service. It scored more victories than any other American squadron during the First World War. With such famous names as Rickenbacker, Lufbery, James Norman Hall and others, it became the most famous unit of early American airpower. The World War One aviator had to have the greatest of courage. When his frail machine broke up or caught fire, he usually fell thousands of feet to his death. He flew during a time when the full color of chivalry appeared and the skies of France saw mounted warriors bearing heraldic markings ride forth for individual combat. Honor and valor were respected by both sides, and the victor toasted the vanquished. This is the spirit and the atmosphere we have tried to recreate for your dining pleasure. Contact us: by phone (858)-560-6771, by email info@94thsandiego.com Order Reserve Call

Social Events | 94th Aero Squadron in Miami, FL Skip to main content Home Hours & Location Menus sub-menu Menus Sunday Brunch Restaurant Menu Wines & Cocktails Special Events sub-menu Special Events Social Events Corporate Events Weddings Special Events Rooms Gallery Upcoming Events Gift Cards Order Online Reservations Toggle Navigation Home Hours & Location Menus sub-menu Menus Sunday Brunch Restaurant Menu Wines & Cocktails Special Events sub-menu Special Events Social Events Corporate Events Weddings Special Events Rooms Gallery Upcoming Events Gift Cards Order Online Careers History Contact About Join our E-Club Facebook Instagram Email powered by BentoBox Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Social Events SPECIAL EVENT CONTACT Phone: 305-261-4220 Email: sales@94miami.com Menus WEDDING PACKAGES: Wedding Reception Packages SHOWER SEASON SPECIALS: Shower Packages QUINCE PACKAGES: Quince Reception Packages CELEBRATION PACKAGES: Celebration Menu EVENTS SIT-DOWN MENU OPTIONS: Sit-Down Menu Selections EVENTS BUFFET MENU OPTIONS: Buffet Menu Selections BREAKFAST OPTIONS: Breakfast Selection Packages BAR & WINE OPTIONS: Event Beverage Options Wine Selections COCKTAIL RECEPTION OPTIONS: Cocktail Reception Packages HORS D'OEUVRES OPTIONS: Hors D'oeuvres Packages JOIN US FOR HOLIDAYS: Holiday Packages The skilled and accommodating, in-house special events staff at The 94Th Aero Squadron is known for putting on dazzling and expertly orchestrated events. As seasoned professionals, The 94th Aero Squadron can create the perfect backdrop for any occasion. With expansive connections to cater to your every need, our team can handle anything from production planning services, exclusive custom menu spreads, venue design and decor, beautiful floral arrangements, and even technical services like audio and visual equipment needs. Whatever your event calls for, The 94th Aero Squadron will deliver. *WEDDINGS                                            *BABY & BRIDAL SHOWERS *BIRTHDAY PARTIES                              *RETIREMENT PARTIES *QUINCES                                               *BAR / BAT MITZVAHS *REHEARSAL DINNERS                        *AWARDS DINNERS *CELEBRATION OF LIFE                        *FUNDRAISERS READY TO START PLANNING YOUR EVENT? To speak with one of our experienced and trusted Event Specialists today, please call 305.261.4220 or Sales@94miami.com Please also use our convenient Special Events web form and an Event Specialist will be in touch with you within 24 hours. Skip to Main Content Toggle navigation Menus Daily Specials Upcoming Events Club 94th Banquets Gift Cards Reservations Careers Facebook page Instagram page Yelp page map marker pin 8885 Balboa Avenue, San Diego, CA 92123 About us It would be difficult to find another restaurant with as much
warmth and charm as the 94th Aero Squadron. Located inside a replica of a World War I French farmhouse, the restaurant sits overlooking Montgomery-Gibbs Executive Airport and is packed full of military memorabilia, antique farm implements, and aviation relics. The interior is cozy and romantic, with huge stone fireplaces, dark wood paneling, beamed ceilings, and old airplane wings hanging over the dining area. More about us Today's Specials $5 off select bar appetizers with valid drink purchase! $1.00 OFF REGULAR PRICED DRAFT & BOTTLED/CANNED BEER, $9.00 WELL DRINKS, $9.00 HOUSE WINE (CABERNET, CHARDONNAY, & ROSÉ), $12.00 COSMOS, MARGARITAS, & LEMON DROPS, $11 SANGRIAS, AND NIGHTLY MANAGER'S SPECIALS 04:00 PM - 06:30 PM ALL SPECIALS Grand Banquet Facilities! First & Third Friday Club Nights! Weekday Lunch Buffet & Weekend Champagne Brunch Buffet! Great View of Montgomery-Gibbs Executive Airport! previous slide next slide Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 Dot slide navigation number 4 Dot slide navigation number 5 Dot slide navigation number 6 Dot slide navigation number 7 Dot slide navigation number 8 Dot slide navigation number 9 slideshow start stop playing Reservations Call us at (858)-560-6771 or book a table below: Reviews review by - Yelp April S: First time here and won't be the last! Definitely sit outside...great views of the planes and not as crowded. Our waiter kept the mimosa glasses filled and the selection of foods was outstanding! You certainly get your monies worth here... review by - Yelp Stacy T: I have been coming here for there Sunday brunch for about two years now. The staff is beyond sweet. They are always personable and make sure to make you feel welcome...Can't say enough great things about the entire staff!!! review by - Yelp Joselyn E: Sunday brunch is phenomenal! The mimosas were the best hangover cure the pasta , fajita and omelet station were all very satisfying recommend to try a bit of everything review by - Yelp Heather M: A San Diego must go! This is the best breakfast brunch buffet in the city. Everything and anything you could want for a brunch is here! You want sushi? They got sushi! You want freshly made crepes? They make they fresh to order! From you typical breakfast foods, to fresh crab legs and everything in between, you won't go home hungry... review by - Yelp Mitch A: ...The place is very cool and has been rooms for different size groups. The restaurant is full of World War two memorabilia and has it's own charm and unique look. We were a party of 130 people and requested a buffet. Our total experience was phenomenal. The food was delicious, hot and plenty of it. The service was excellent... As seasoned professionals, The 94thAero Squadron can create the perfect backdrop for any occasion. With expansive connections to cater to your every need, our team can handle anything from production planning services, exclusive custom menu spreads, venue design and decor, beautiful floral arrangements, and even technical services like audio and visual equipment needs. Whatever your event calls for, The 94thAero Squadron will deliver. READY TO START PLANNING YOUR EVENT? To speak with one of our experienced and trusted Event Specialists today, please call 305.261.4220 or Sales@94miami.com Please also use our convenient Special Events web form and an Event Specialist will be in touch with you within 24 hours. 		                            94th Aero Squadron Restaurant
		                            on the Here Comes The Guide website. 305-261-4220 Email About Video Deals Prices Capacity Details Map Why You'll Love This Place A Here Comes The Guide Wedding Venue Review Read More Show Less You'll find an inspired combination of Old World charm and tropical landscaping , set in a surprisingly modern locale. The restaurant's European-style architecture and palm-shaded courtyard offer an exciting contrast to the dynamic vistas of Miami International Airport's comings and goings. Their Firelight Patio Garden is a tranquil site for a waterside ceremony. With a surround of colorful flora, unique stone and stucco exteriors, and super-cool vintage planes nearby, you're guaranteed to capture memorable photos. The romantic Nieuport Room has a sense of grandeur , with hand-hewn beams, soaring multipaned windows, rich fabrics, and cluster chandeliers. But there's an array of choices here, from room size to décor to menus, that come with with full-service, all-inclusive planning and coordination. Video Video by Santiago Guy Films. Video by Dana Lynn Photography. Deals Venue Virtual Tour Special! Book on the spot following a virtual tour of the venue, and receive 10% off the rental fee! Deposit of $500 required with booking. PRICES: What's this going to cost? Ceremony Fee $1,000/event The fee is for a ceremony setup. Package Prices $59–105/person Package prices vary depending on: Package chosen Fully-customized packages can include: Exclusive use of the selected reception space Hors d'oeuvres and dinner Open bar services Wedding cake Champagne toast Tables, chairs, and linens Setup and teardown staff And more! Service Charge or Gratuity 20% get a custom quote!
